datasets.name: a92ace17
queryLines:
SELECT 
  COUNT(DISTINCT CONCAT(ist.table_catalog, '.', ist.table_schema, '.', ist.table_name)) AS full_name_count
FROM 
  system.information_schema.tables ist
  LEFT JOIN 
    (SELECT 
       tl.source_table_catalog,
       tl.source_table_schema,
       tl.source_table_name
     FROM 
       system.access.table_lineage tl
     WHERE 
       tl.event_time BETWEEN :date_filter.min AND :date_filter.max
       AND tl.source_type IN ('TABLE', 'STREAMING_TABLE')
    ) tl
    ON 
      tl.source_table_catalog = ist.table_catalog 
      AND tl.source_table_schema = ist.table_schema 
      AND tl.source_table_name = ist.table_name
WHERE
  tl.source_table_catalog IS NULL;

datasets.name: 763a2da9
queryLines:
WITH TableReads AS (
    SELECT
        CONCAT(source_table_catalog, '.', source_table_schema, '.', source_table_name) AS table_full_name,
        COUNT(*) AS read_count
    FROM
        system.access.table_lineage
    WHERE
        source_table_catalog IS NOT NULL
        AND event_date BETWEEN :date_filter.min AND :date_filter.max
    GROUP BY
        table_full_name
),
LatestTargetDate AS (
    SELECT
        CONCAT(target_table_catalog, '.', target_table_schema, '.', target_table_name) AS table_full_name,
        MAX(event_date) AS latest_target_date
    FROM
        system.access.table_lineage
    WHERE
        target_table_catalog IS NOT NULL
    GROUP BY
        table_full_name
)
SELECT
    tr.table_full_name,
    tr.read_count,
    COALESCE(ltd.latest_target_date, 'N/A') AS latest_target_date
FROM
    TableReads tr
LEFT JOIN
    LatestTargetDate ltd ON tr.table_full_name = ltd.table_full_name
ORDER BY
    tr.read_count DESC
LIMIT 10;

    THEN "10/10" 
    WHEN (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM system.information_schema.column_tags) > 5 
    THEN "5/10" 
    ELSE "0/10" 
  END

WITH waf_status AS (
  SELECT
   waf_id,
   pillar,
   principle,
   best_practice,
    check_type,
    source_object,
    CASE 
      WHEN waf_id = 'DG-01-03' AND EXISTS (
        SELECT 1 FROM system.access.table_lineage LIMIT 1
      ) THEN 'Yes'
      WHEN waf_id = 'DG-01-04' AND EXISTS (
        SELECT 1 FROM system.information_schema.tables WHERE comment IS NOT NULL LIMIT 1
      ) THEN 'Yes'
      WHEN waf_id = 'DG-01-05' AND EXISTS (
        SELECT 1 FROM system.information_schema.table_tags LIMIT 1
      ) THEN 'Yes'
      WHEN waf_id = 'DG-02-01' AND EXISTS (
        SELECT 1 FROM system.information_schema.row_filters LIMIT 1
      ) THEN 'Yes'
      WHEN waf_id = 'DG-02-02' AND EXISTS (
        SELECT 1 FROM system.access.audit where
          event_date BETWEEN :date_filter.min AND :date_filter.max LIMIT 1
      ) THEN 'Yes'
      WHEN waf_id = 'DG-02-03' AND EXISTS (
      SELECT 1
          FROM system.information_schema.tables
          WHERE table_catalog = 'system'
          AND table_schema = 'marketplace'
          AND table_name = 'listing_access_events'
    ) THEN 'Yes'
      WHEN waf_id = 'DG-03-02' AND EXISTS (
        SELECT 1 FROM system.information_schema.tables 
        WHERE table_name LIKE '%_drift_metrics' OR table_name LIKE '%_profile_metrics' 
        LIMIT 1
      ) THEN 'Yes'
      WHEN waf_id = 'DG-03-03' AND EXISTS (
        SELECT 1 FROM system.information_schema.tables 
        WHERE table_type = 'BASE TABLE'
        LIMIT 1
      ) THEN 'Yes'
      ELSE 'No'
    END AS implemented
  FROM (
    SELECT * FROM VALUES
    ('DG-01-03', 'Data & AI Governance', 'Unify data and AI management', 'Track data and AI lineage', 'AUTO', 'system.access.table_lineage'),
    ('DG-01-04', 'Data & AI Governance', 'Unify data and AI management', 'Add comments to metadata', 'AUTO', 'system.information_schema.columns'),
    ('DG-01-05', 'Data & AI Governance', 'Unify data and AI management', 'Enable easy data discovery', 'AUTO', 'system.information_schema.table_tags'),
    ('DG-02-01', 'Data & AI Governance', 'Unify data and AI security', 'Centralize access control (row/column level)', 'AUTO', 'system.information_schema.row_filters'),
    ('DG-02-02', 'Data & AI Governance', 'Unify data and AI security', 'Configure audit logging', 'AUTO', 'system.access.audit'),
    ('DG-02-03', 'Data & AI Governance', 'Unify data and AI security', 'Audit data platform events', 'AUTO', 'system.marketplace.listing_access_events'),
    ('DG-03-02', 'Data & AI Governance', 'Establish data quality standards', 'Use data quality tools and profiling', 'PATTERN', 'system.information_schema.tables'),
    ('DG-03-03', 'Data & AI Governance', 'Establish data quality standards', 'Enforce standardized data formats', 'AUTO', 'system.information_schema.tables')
  AS waf(waf_id, pillar, principle, best_practice, check_type, source_object)
  )
)

SELECT
  waf_id,
  principle,
  best_practice,
  implemented,
  COUNT(*) OVER (PARTITION BY principle) AS total_controls,
  ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY principle ORDER BY waf_id) AS row_num,
  SUM(CASE WHEN implemented = 'Yes' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) OVER (PARTITION BY principle) AS implemented_controls,
  ROUND(100 * SUM(CASE WHEN implemented = 'Yes' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) OVER (PARTITION BY principle)/ COUNT(*) OVER (PARTITION BY principle) , 0) AS completion_percent,
  ROUND(100 * SUM(CASE WHEN implemented = 'Yes' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) OVER () / COUNT(*) OVER (), 0) AS total_percentage,
  'Summary' AS dataset_type,
  check_type,
  source_object
FROM waf_status

datasets.name: 8486d58c
queryLines:
WITH lineage_tables AS (
  SELECT DISTINCT
    source_table_catalog,
    source_table_schema,
    source_table_name
  FROM
    (
      select distinct
        source_table_catalog,
        source_table_schema,
        source_table_name
      from
        system.access.table_lineage
      union
      select distinct
        target_table_catalog,
        target_table_catalog,
        target_table_name
      from
        system.access.table_lineage
    )
  WHERE
    source_table_catalog IS NOT NULL
),
table_list AS (
  SELECT
    table_catalog,
    table_schema,
    table_name,
    table_type
  from
    system.information_schema.tables
 -- where
   -- table_type not in ('FOREIGN')
)
SELECT
  table_list.table_type,
  COUNT(*) AS total_tables,
  SUM(
    CASE
      WHEN lineage_tables.source_table_catalog IS NULL THEN 0
      ELSE 1
    END
  ) AS lineage_tables
FROM
  table_list
    LEFT JOIN lineage_tables
      ON table_list.table_catalog = lineage_tables.source_table_catalog
      AND table_list.table_schema = lineage_tables.source_table_schema
      AND table_list.table_name = lineage_tables.source_table_name
GROUP BY
  table_list.table_type

datasets.name: c19487ca
queryLines:
SELECT
  waf_id,
  principle,
  practice,
  source_object,
  CASE 
    WHEN waf_id = 'IU-01-01' AND EXISTS (
      SELECT 1 FROM system.billing.usage WHERE usage_type = 'API_OPERATION' LIMIT 1
    ) THEN 'Yes'
    WHEN waf_id = 'IU-01-02' AND EXISTS (
      SELECT 1 FROM system.information_schema.connections LIMIT 1
    ) THEN 'Yes'
    WHEN waf_id = 'IU-01-03' AND EXISTS (
      SELECT 1 FROM system.access.audit WHERE action_name LIKE '%PartnerConnection%' LIMIT 1
    ) THEN 'Yes'
    WHEN waf_id = 'IU-02-01' AND EXISTS (
      SELECT 1 FROM system.information_schema.tables WHERE data_source_format = 'DELTA' LIMIT 1
    ) THEN 'Yes'
    WHEN waf_id = 'IU-02-02' AND EXISTS (
      SELECT 1 FROM system.access.audit WHERE action_name LIKE '%DeltaSharing%' LIMIT 1
    ) THEN 'Yes'
    WHEN waf_id = 'IU-02-03' AND EXISTS (
      SELECT 1 --Currently in Private preview -- FROM system.mlflow.experiments_latest LIMIT 1
    ) THEN 'Yes'
    WHEN waf_id = 'IU-03-01' AND EXISTS (
      SELECT catalog_owner, COUNT(*) FROM system.information_schema.catalogs GROUP BY catalog_owner HAVING COUNT(*) > 1
    ) THEN 'Yes'
    WHEN waf_id = 'IU-03-02' AND EXISTS (
      SELECT 1 FROM system.billing.usage WHERE usage_type LIKE '%SERVERLESS%' LIMIT 1
    ) THEN 'Yes'
    WHEN waf_id = 'IU-03-03' AND EXISTS (
      SELECT 1 FROM system.compute.clusters WHERE policy_id IS NOT NULL LIMIT 1
    ) THEN 'Yes'
    WHEN waf_id = 'IU-03-04' AND EXISTS (
      SELECT 1 FROM system.access.assistant_events LIMIT 1
    ) THEN 'Yes'
    WHEN waf_id = 'IU-04-03' AND EXISTS (
      SELECT 1 FROM system.access.table_lineage LIMIT 1
    ) THEN 'Yes'
    ELSE 'No'
  END AS implemented
FROM (
  SELECT * FROM VALUES
    ('IU-01-01', 'Define standards for integration', 'Use standard and reusable integration patterns', 'system.billing.usage'),
    ('IU-01-02', 'Define standards for integration', 'Use optimized connectors to ingest data sources', 'system.information_schema.connections'),
    ('IU-01-03', 'Define standards for integration', 'Use certified partner tools', 'system.access.audit'),
    ('IU-02-01', 'Utilize open interfaces and data formats', 'Use open data formats', 'system.information_schema.tables'),
    ('IU-02-02', 'Utilize open interfaces and data formats', 'Enable secure data sharing', 'system.access.audit'),
    ('IU-02-03', 'Utilize open interfaces and data formats', 'Use open standards for AI workflows', 'system.mlflow.experiments_latest'),
    ('IU-03-01', 'Simplify new use case implementation', 'Provide a self-service experience', 'system.information_schema.catalogs'),
    ('IU-03-02', 'Simplify new use case implementation', 'Use serverless services', 'system.billing.usage'),
    ('IU-03-03', 'Simplify new use case implementation', 'Use pre-defined compute templates', 'system.compute.clusters'),
    ('IU-03-04', 'Simplify new use case implementation', 'Use AI productivity tools', 'system.assistant.usage'),
    ('IU-04-03', 'Ensure data consistency and usability', 'Provide central catalog for discovery and lineage', 'system.access.table_lineage')
) waf(waf_id, principle, practice, source_object);

datasets.name: 83c64453
queryLines:
WITH waf_status AS (
  SELECT
    waf_id,
    principle,
    practice,
    description,
    CASE 
      WHEN waf_id = 'IU-01-01' AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM system.billing.usage WHERE usage_type = 'API_OPERATION' LIMIT 1) THEN 'Yes'
      WHEN waf_id = 'IU-01-02' AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM system.information_schema.connections LIMIT 1) THEN 'Yes'
      WHEN waf_id = 'IU-01-03' AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM system.access.audit WHERE action_name LIKE '%PartnerConnection%' LIMIT 1) THEN 'Yes'
      WHEN waf_id = 'IU-02-01' AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM system.information_schema.tables WHERE data_source_format = 'DELTA' LIMIT 1) THEN 'Yes'
      WHEN waf_id = 'IU-02-02' AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM system.access.audit WHERE action_name LIKE '%DeltaSharing%' LIMIT 1) THEN 'Yes'
      WHEN waf_id = 'IU-02-03' AND EXISTS (SELECT 1) THEN 'Yes'
      WHEN waf_id = 'IU-03-01' AND EXISTS (SELECT catalog_owner, COUNT(DISTINCT catalog_owner) FROM system.information_schema.catalogs GROUP BY catalog_owner HAVING COUNT(*) > 1) THEN 'Yes'
      WHEN waf_id = 'IU-03-02' AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM system.billing.usage WHERE usage_type LIKE '%SERVERLESS%' LIMIT 1) THEN 'Yes'
      WHEN waf_id = 'IU-03-03' AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM system.compute.clusters WHERE policy_id IS NOT NULL LIMIT 1) THEN 'Yes'
      WHEN waf_id = 'IU-03-04' AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM system.access.assistant_events LIMIT 1) THEN 'Yes'
      WHEN waf_id = 'IU-04-03' AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM system.access.table_lineage LIMIT 1) THEN 'Yes'
      ELSE 'No'
    END AS implemented
  FROM (
    SELECT * FROM VALUES
      ('IU-01-01', 'Define standards for integration', 'Use standard and reusable integration patterns', 'Tracks usage of REST API, SDKs, CLI for external integration'),
      ('IU-01-02', 'Define standards for integration', 'Use optimized connectors to ingest data sources (Federation)', 'Monitors federated connectors to external sources'),
      ('IU-01-03', 'Define standards for integration', 'Use certified partner tools', 'Captures Partner Connect actions from audit logs'),
      ('IU-02-01', 'Utilize open interfaces and data formats', 'Use open data formats (Delta)', 'Verifies use of Delta tables'),
      ('IU-02-02', 'Utilize open interfaces and data formats', 'Enable secure data sharing (Delta Sharing)', 'Detects Delta Sharing usage from audit events'),
      ('IU-02-03', 'Utilize open interfaces and data formats', 'Use open standards for AI workflows (MLflow)', 'Checks MLflow experiments and runs in system tables'),
      ('IU-03-01', 'Simplify new use case implementation', 'Provide a self-service experience across the platform', 'Indicates multi-catalog ownership for self-service structure'),
      ('IU-03-02', 'Simplify new use case implementation', 'Use serverless services', 'Confirms serverless workloads in billing logs'),
      ('IU-03-03', 'Simplify new use case implementation', 'Use pre-defined compute templates (Cluster Policies)', 'Validates cluster policy usage'),
      ('IU-03-04', 'Simplify new use case implementation', 'Use AI productivity tools (Databricks Assistant)', 'Shows Assistant usage through interaction logs'),
      ('IU-04-03', 'Ensure data consistency and usability', 'Provide central catalog for discovery and lineage', 'Validates presence of lineage and shared catalogs')
    AS waf(waf_id, principle, practice, description)
  )
)

SELECT
  principle,
  COUNT(*) AS total_controls,
  SUM(CASE WHEN implemented = 'Yes' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS implemented_controls,
  ROUND(100 * SUM(CASE WHEN implemented = 'Yes' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / COUNT(*), 0) AS completion_percent
FROM waf_status
GROUP BY principle
ORDER BY principle

FROM waf_status;

      WHEN waf_id = 'IU-02-03' AND EXISTS (SELECT 1) THEN 'Yes'
      WHEN waf_id = 'IU-03-01' AND EXISTS (SELECT catalog_owner, COUNT(DISTINCT catalog_owner) FROM system.information_schema.catalogs GROUP BY catalog_owner HAVING COUNT(*) > 1) THEN 'Yes'
      WHEN waf_id = 'IU-03-02' AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM system.billing.usage WHERE usage_type LIKE '%SERVERLESS%' LIMIT 1) THEN 'Yes'
      WHEN waf_id = 'IU-03-03' AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM system.compute.clusters WHERE policy_id IS NOT NULL LIMIT 1) THEN 'Yes'
      WHEN waf_id = 'IU-03-04' AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM system.access.assistant_events LIMIT 1) THEN 'Yes'
      WHEN waf_id = 'IU-04-03' AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM system.access.table_lineage LIMIT 1) THEN 'Yes'*/
      WHEN waf_id = 'DG-01-03' AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM system.access.table_lineage LIMIT 1) THEN 'Yes'
      WHEN waf_id = 'DG-01-04' AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM system.information_schema.tables WHERE comment IS NOT NULL LIMIT 1) THEN 'Yes'
      WHEN waf_id = 'DG-01-05' AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM system.information_schema.table_tags LIMIT 1) THEN 'Yes'
      WHEN waf_id = 'DG-02-01' AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM system.information_schema.row_filters LIMIT 1) THEN 'Yes'
      WHEN waf_id = 'DG-02-02' AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM system.access.audit LIMIT 1) THEN 'Yes'
      WHEN waf_id = 'DG-02-03' AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM system.information_schema.tables WHERE table_catalog = 'system' AND table_schema = 'marketplace' AND table_name = 'listing_access_events')THEN 'Yes'
      WHEN waf_id = 'DG-03-02' AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM system.information_schema.tables WHERE table_name LIKE '%_drift_metrics' OR table_name LIKE '%_profile_metrics' LIMIT 1) THEN 'Yes'
      WHEN waf_id = 'DG-03-03' AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM system.information_schema.tables WHERE table_type = 'BASE TABLE' LIMIT 1) THEN 'Yes'
      WHEN waf_id = 'CO-01-01' AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM system.information_schema.tables WHERE data_source_format = 'DELTA' LIMIT 1) THEN 'Yes'
      WHEN waf_id = 'CO-01-03' AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM system.billing.usage WHERE usage_type LIKE '%SQL%' LIMIT 1) THEN 'Yes'
      WHEN waf_id = 'CO-01-04' AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM system.compute.clusters WHERE dbr_version IS NOT NULL LIMIT 1) THEN 'Yes'
      WHEN waf_id = 'CO-01-06' AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM system.billing.usage WHERE usage_type LIKE '%SERVERLESS%' LIMIT 1) THEN 'Yes'
      WHEN waf_id = 'CO-01-09' AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM system.billing.usage WHERE product_features.is_photon = true LIMIT 1) THEN 'Yes'
      WHEN waf_id = 'CO-02-03' AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM system.compute.clusters WHERE policy_id IS NOT NULL LIMIT 1) THEN 'Yes'
      WHEN waf_id = 'CO-03-01' AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM system.billing.usage LIMIT 1) THEN 'Yes'
      WHEN waf_id = 'CO-03-02' AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM system.compute.clusters WHERE size(map_keys(tags)) > 0 LIMIT 1) THEN 'Yes'
      WHEN waf_id = 'CO-03-03' AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM system.billing.usage LIMIT 1) THEN 'Yes'
      WHEN waf_id = 'PE-01-01' AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM system.billing.usage WHERE usage.sku_name LIKE '%JOBS_SERVERLESS_COMPUTE%' OR usage.sku_name LIKE '%SERVERLESS_SQL%' LIMIT 1) THEN 'Yes'
      WHEN waf_id = 'PE-01-02' AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM system.billing.usage WHERE usage.sku_name LIKE '%SERVERLESS_REAL_TIME_INFERENCE%' LIMIT 1 ) THEN 'Yes'
      WHEN waf_id = 'PE-02-02' AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM system.compute.clusters WHERE worker_count > 1 LIMIT 1) THEN 'Yes'
      WHEN waf_id = 'PE-02-04' AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM system.compute.clusters WHERE worker_count > 3 LIMIT 1) THEN 'Yes'
      WHEN waf_id = 'PE-02-05' AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM system.information_schema.routines WHERE external_language = 'Python' LIMIT 1) THEN 'Yes'
      WHEN waf_id = 'PE-02-06' AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM system.billing.usage WHERE billing_origin_product IN ('ALL_PURPOSE','JOBS','DLT') AND product_features.is_photon = true LIMIT 1) THEN 'Yes'
      WHEN waf_id = 'PE-02-07' AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM system.compute.clusters HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT split(worker_node_type,'[.]')[0])/COUNT(1) >= 0.05) THEN 'Yes'
      /*WHEN waf_id = 'SCP-01-06' AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM system.access.audit WHERE action_name = 'mintOAuthToken' LIMIT 1) THEN 'Yes'
      WHEN waf_id = 'SCP-01-11' AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM FROM system.access.audit WHERE action_name IN ('workspaceInHouseOAuthClientAuthentication', 'mintOAuthAuthorizationCode') LIMIT 1) THEN 'Yes'
      WHEN waf_id = 'SCP-01-12' AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM system.compute.clusters WHERE data_security_mode = "USER_ISOLATION" LIMIT 1) THEN 'Yes'
      WHEN waf_id = 'SCP-02-01' AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM system.information_schema.tables WHERE storage_path LIKE 'dbfs:/%' OR storage_path LIKE '/dbfs/%' LIMIT 1) THEN 'Yes'
      WHEN waf_id IN ('SCP-02-03', 'SCP-03-03') AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM system.access.outbound_network LIMIT 1) THEN 'Yes'
      WHEN waf_id = 'SCP-06-01' AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM system.query.history where lower(statement_text) LIKE '%system.%' LIMIT 1) THEN 'Yes'
      WHEN waf_id = 'SCP-06-02' AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM system.query.history where lower(statement_text) LIKE '%system.access.audit%' LIMIT 1) THEN 'Yes'
      WHEN waf_id = 'SCP-06-03' AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM system.query.history where lower(statement_text) LIKE '%system.compute.clusters%' AND lower(statement_text) LIKE '%create_time%'  LIMIT 1) THEN 'Yes'
      WHEN waf_id = 'SCP-06-05' AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM system.compute.clusters where cardinality(tags) > 0 LIMIT 1) THEN 'Yes'*/
      WHEN waf_id = 'R-01-01' AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM system.information_schema.tables WHERE data_source_format IN  ('DELTA','ICEBERG') LIMIT 1) THEN 'Yes'
      WHEN waf_id = 'R-01-02' THEN 'Yes'
      WHEN waf_id IN ('R-01-03','R-02-04') AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM system.billing.usage WHERE billing_origin_product = 'DLT' LIMIT 1) THEN 'Yes'
      WHEN waf_id = 'R-01-05' AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM system.billing.usage WHERE billing_origin_product = 'MODEL_SERVING' LIMIT 1) THEN 'Yes'
      WHEN waf_id = 'R-01-06' AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM system.billing.usage WHERE sku_name LIKE '%SERVERLESS%' OR sku_name LIKE '%DLT%' LIMIT 1) THEN 'Yes'
      WHEN waf_id = 'R-02-03' AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM system.information_schema.metastores LIMIT 1) THEN 'Yes'
      WHEN waf_id = 'R-03-01' AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM system.compute.clusters WHERE ifnull(max_autoscale_Workers,0) > 0 LIMIT 1) THEN 'Yes'
      WHEN waf_id = 'R-03-02' AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM system.compute.warehouses where max_clusters - min_clusters > 0 LIMIT 1) THEN 'Yes'
      ELSE 'No'
    END AS implemented,
    CASE 
      WHEN waf_id LIKE 'IU-%' THEN 'Interoperability & Usability'
      WHEN waf_id LIKE 'DG-%' THEN 'Data & AI Governance'
      WHEN waf_id LIKE 'CO-%' THEN 'Cost Optimization'
      WHEN waf_id LIKE 'PE-%' THEN 'Performance Efficiency'
      WHEN waf_id LIKE 'SCP-%' THEN 'Security, Compliance and Privacy'
      WHEN waf_id LIKE 'R-%'  THEN 'Reliability'
    END AS pillar
  FROM (
    SELECT * FROM VALUES
      /*('IU-01-01'), ('IU-01-02'), ('IU-01-03'),
      ('IU-02-01'), ('IU-02-02'), ('IU-02-03'),
      ('IU-03-01'), ('IU-03-02'), ('IU-03-03'), ('IU-03-04'),
      ('IU-04-03'),*/
      ('DG-01-03'), ('DG-01-04'), ('DG-01-05'),
      ('DG-02-01'), ('DG-02-02'), ('DG-02-03'),
      ('DG-03-02'), ('DG-03-03'),
      ('CO-01-01'), ('CO-01-03'), ('CO-01-04'), ('CO-01-06'), ('CO-01-09'),
      ('CO-02-03'), ('CO-03-01'), ('CO-03-02'), ('CO-03-03'),
      ('PE-01-01'),('PE-01-02'),
      ('PE-02-02'),('PE-02-04'),('PE-02-05'),('PE-02-06'),('PE-02-07'),
      /*('SCP-01-06'), ('SCP-01-11'),('SCP-01-12'),
      ('SCP-02-01'),('SCP-02-03'),
      ('SCP-03-03'),
      ('SCP-06-01'),('SCP-06-02'),('SCP-06-03'),('SCP-06-05'),*/
      ('R-01-01'),('R-01-02'),('R-01-03'),('R-01-05'),('R-01-06'),
      ('R-02-03'),('R-02-04'),
      ('R-03-01'),('R-03-02')
    AS waf(waf_id)
  )
)

SELECT
  pillar,
  COUNT(*) AS total_controls,
  SUM(CASE WHEN implemented = 'Yes' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS implemented_controls,
  ROUND(100 * SUM(CASE WHEN implemented = 'Yes' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / COUNT(*), 0) AS completion_percent
FROM waf_status
GROUP BY pillar;

datasets.name: dbdc9433
queryLines:
WITH CO_01_01 AS (
  SELECT  
   'CO_01_01' AS waf_id,
   'Detailed' AS dataset_type,
    data_source_format AS tables_format,
    table_type,
    count(data_source_format) AS no_of_tables
    --table_type
  FROM system.information_schema.tables group by all 
),
CO_01_01_perc AS (
  SELECT 
    ROUND((SUM(CASE WHEN tables_format IN('DELTA','ICEBERG') THEN no_of_tables ELSE 0 END)
              /COUNT(1))*100,2) AS actual_perc,
    'CO-01-01' AS waf_id,
    'Percentage' AS dataset_type
  FROM CO_01_01
),
waf_status AS(
  SELECT
  waf_id,
  principle,
  best_practice,
  CASE 
    WHEN waf_id = 'CO-01-01' AND EXISTS (
      SELECT 1 FROM system.information_schema.tables WHERE data_source_format = 'DELTA' LIMIT 1
    ) THEN 'Yes'
    -- WHEN waf_id = 'CO-01-02' AND EXISTS (
    --   SELECT 1 FROM system.lakeflow.job_task_run_timeline JOIN system.compute.clusters USING (cluster_id)
    --   WHERE is_interactive = false LIMIT 1
    -- ) THEN 'Yes'
    WHEN waf_id = 'CO-01-03' AND EXISTS (
      SELECT 1 FROM system.billing.usage WHERE usage_type LIKE '%SQL%' LIMIT 1
    ) THEN 'Yes'
    WHEN waf_id = 'CO-01-04' AND EXISTS (
      SELECT 1 FROM system.compute.clusters WHERE dbr_version IS NOT NULL LIMIT 1
    ) THEN 'Yes'
    WHEN waf_id = 'CO-01-06' AND EXISTS (
      SELECT 1 FROM system.billing.usage WHERE usage_type LIKE '%SERVERLESS%' LIMIT 1
    ) THEN 'Yes'
    WHEN waf_id = 'CO-01-09' AND EXISTS (
      SELECT 1 FROM system.billing.usage WHERE product_features.is_photon = true LIMIT 1
    ) THEN 'Yes'
    WHEN waf_id = 'CO-02-03' AND EXISTS (
      SELECT 1 FROM system.compute.clusters WHERE policy_id IS NOT NULL LIMIT 1
    ) THEN 'Yes'
    WHEN waf_id = 'CO-03-01' AND EXISTS (
      SELECT 1 FROM system.billing.usage LIMIT 1
    ) THEN 'Yes'
    WHEN waf_id = 'CO-03-02' AND EXISTS (
      SELECT 1 FROM system.compute.clusters WHERE size(map_keys(tags)) > 0 LIMIT 1
    ) THEN 'Yes'
    WHEN waf_id = 'CO-03-03' AND EXISTS (
      SELECT 1 FROM system.billing.usage LIMIT 1
    ) THEN 'Yes'
    ELSE 'No'
  END AS implemented
FROM (
  SELECT * FROM VALUES
    ('CO-01-01', 'Choose optimal resources', 'Use performance optimized data formats'),
    --('CO-01-02', 'Choose optimal resources', 'Use job clusters'),
    ('CO-01-03', 'Choose optimal resources', 'Use SQL warehouse for SQL workloads'),
    ('CO-01-04', 'Choose optimal resources', 'Use up-to-date runtimes'),
    ('CO-01-06', 'Choose optimal resources', 'Use Serverless for your workloads'),
    ('CO-01-09', 'Choose optimal resources', 'Evaluate performance optimized query engines'),
    ('CO-02-03', 'Dynamically allocate resources', 'Use compute policies to control costs'),
    ('CO-03-01', 'Monitor and control cost', 'Monitor costs'),
    ('CO-03-02', 'Monitor and control cost', 'Tag clusters for cost attribution'),
    ('CO-03-03', 'Monitor and control cost', 'Implement observability to track & chargeback cost')
) waf(waf_id, principle, best_practice)
)
SELECT
waf_id,
  principle,
  best_practice,
  implemented,
  0 AS actual_perc,
  0 AS required_percentage,
  COUNT(*) OVER (PARTITION BY principle) AS total_controls,
  ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY principle ORDER BY waf_id) AS row_num,
  SUM(CASE WHEN implemented = 'Yes' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) OVER (PARTITION BY principle) AS implemented_controls,
  ROUND(100 * SUM(CASE WHEN implemented = 'Yes' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) OVER (PARTITION BY principle)/ COUNT(*) OVER (PARTITION BY principle) , 0) AS completion_percent,
  ROUND(100 * SUM(CASE WHEN implemented = 'Yes' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) OVER () / COUNT(*) OVER (), 0) AS total_percentage,
  'Summary' AS dataset_type
  FROM
waf_status

datasets.name: a5da7a83
queryLines:
SELECT 
    --table_catalog AS cat_name,
    --table_schema AS sch_name,
    case 
        when data_source_format in ('DELTA' ,'DELTA_UNIFORM_ICEBERG','DELTASHARING') then 'Delta'
        when data_source_format = 'ICEBERG' then 'Iceberg'
        else 'Other' 
        end AS tables_format,
    count(data_source_format) AS no_of_tables
    --table_type
    FROM system.information_schema.tables
    where table_schema not in ('information_schema') 
    group by all order by no_of_tables desc;

datasets.name: feca6b37
queryLines:
with clusters AS (
  SELECT
    *,
    ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY workspace_id, cluster_id ORDER BY change_time DESC) as rn
  FROM system.compute.clusters
  WHERE cluster_source="UI" OR cluster_source="API"
  QUALIFY rn=1
),
job_tasks_exploded AS (
  SELECT
    workspace_id,
    job_id,
    EXPLODE(compute_ids) as cluster_id
  FROM system.lakeflow.job_task_run_timeline
  WHERE period_start_time >= CURRENT_DATE() - INTERVAL 30 DAY
  GROUP BY ALL
),
all_purpose_cluster_jobs AS (
  SELECT
    t1.*,
    t2.cluster_name,
    t2.owned_by,
    t2.dbr_version
  FROM job_tasks_exploded t1
    INNER JOIN clusters t2 USING (workspace_id, cluster_id)
)
SELECT * FROM all_purpose_cluster_jobs LIMIT 10;

select regexp_extract(dbr_version, '^(\\d+\\.\\d+)',1) as version, count(*) as count
from system.compute.clusters 
where not contains(dbr_version, 'custom') 
  and cluster_source not in('PIPELINE','PIPELINE_MAINTENANCE') 
  and delete_time is null
group by 1
order by count desc;

datasets.name: 62126ae8
a36b2899
aed75aae
queryLines:
--ToDo: Use account_prices system table when available
select 
--t1.usage_date,
case when t1.sku_name like '%SERVERLESS_SQL%' then 'SQL_SERVERLESS' 
when t1.sku_name like '%ENTERPRISE_SQL_COMPUTE%' then 'SQL_CLASSIC'
when t1.sku_name like '%SQL_PRO%' then 'SQL_PRO'
else 'Other' end as sql_sku_name,
SUM(t1.usage_quantity * list_prices.pricing.default) as list_cost
FROM system.billing.usage t1
INNER JOIN system.billing.list_prices on
   t1.cloud = list_prices.cloud and
   t1.sku_name = list_prices.sku_name and
   t1.usage_start_time >= list_prices.price_start_time and
   (t1.usage_end_time <= list_prices.price_end_time or list_prices.price_end_time is null)
where t1.sku_name like '%SQL%' and t1.usage_date >= current_date() - interval 30 days
group by all

queryLines:
-- based on: https://community.databricks.com/t5/data-engineering/cpu-usage-and-idle-time-metrics-from-system-tables/td-p/116314
WITH per_cluster_daily AS (
  SELECT
    cluster_id,
    
    -- DATE_TRUNC('DAY', start_time) AS day,
    AVG(cpu_user_percent + cpu_system_percent) AS avg_cpu_usage_percent -- Average CPU usage as the sum of user and system CPU
    --100 - AVG(cpu_user_percent + cpu_system_percent) AS avg_cpu_idle_percent,                      -- Average CPU idle time percentage
  --  , AVG(mem_used_percent) AS avg_memory_usage_percent                   -- Average memory usage percentage
  FROM
    system.compute.node_timeline
  WHERE
    start_time >= CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL 30 DAYS -- Limit data to the last 30 days (optional)
  GROUP BY
    cluster_id
    -- , DATE_TRUNC('DAY', start_time)
)
select c.cluster_name, cd.* from 
per_cluster_daily cd join system.compute.clusters c on cd.cluster_id = c.cluster_id

datasets.name: e46a4a40
queryLines:
-- How often is system.billing.usage accessed L28d? Eg 19k in field-eng L30d
select
  event_date,
  count(*) as usage_read
from
  system.access.audit
where
  service_name = 'unityCatalog'
  and action_name = 'getTable'
  and request_params.full_name_arg = 'system.billing.usage'
  and user_identity.email != 'System-User'
  and (date_diff(day, event_date, current_date()) <= 90)
group by event_date
order by event_date;

datasets.name: 554446fd
queryLines:
SELECT
  waf_id,
  principle,
  best_practice,
  CASE 
    WHEN waf_id = 'SCP-01-06' AND EXISTS (
      SELECT 1 FROM system.access.audit WHERE action_name = 'mintOAuthToken' LIMIT 1
    ) THEN 'Yes'
    -- WHEN waf_id = 'SCP-01-08' AND EXISTS (
    --   SELECT 1 FROM system.access.audit WHERE action_name = 'mintOAuthToken' LIMIT 1 -- update query
    -- ) THEN 'Yes'
    WHEN waf_id = 'SCP-01-11' AND EXISTS (
      SELECT 1 FROM FROM system.access.audit WHERE action_name IN ('workspaceInHouseOAuthClientAuthentication', 'mintOAuthAuthorizationCode') LIMIT 1
    ) THEN 'Yes'
    WHEN waf_id = 'SCP-01-12' AND EXISTS (
      SELECT 1 FROM system.compute.clusters WHERE data_security_mode = "USER_ISOLATION" LIMIT 1
    ) THEN 'Yes'
    -- WHEN waf_id = 'SCP-01-13' AND EXISTS (
    --   SELECT 1 FROM system.lakeflow.jobs WHERE run_as LIKE 'zzz' LIMIT 1 -- not able to identify service principal from run_as column
    -- ) THEN 'Yes'
    WHEN waf_id = 'SCP-02-01' AND NOT EXISTS (
      SELECT 1 FROM system.information_schema.tables WHERE storage_path LIKE 'dbfs:/%' OR storage_path LIKE '/dbfs/%' LIMIT 1
    ) THEN 'Yes'
    WHEN waf_id IN ('SCP-02-03', 'SCP-03-03') AND EXISTS (
      SELECT 1 FROM system.access.outbound_network LIMIT 1
    ) THEN 'Yes'
    WHEN waf_id = 'SCP-06-01' AND EXISTS (
        SELECT 1 FROM system.query.history where lower(statement_text) LIKE '%system.%' LIMIT 1
    ) THEN 'Yes'
    WHEN waf_id = 'SCP-06-02' AND EXISTS (
        SELECT 1 FROM system.query.history where lower(statement_text) LIKE '%system.access.audit%' LIMIT 1
    ) THEN 'Yes'
    WHEN waf_id = 'SCP-06-03' AND EXISTS (
        SELECT 1 FROM system.query.history where lower(statement_text) LIKE '%system.compute.clusters%' AND lower(statement_text) LIKE '%create_time%'  LIMIT 1
    ) THEN 'Yes'
    WHEN waf_id = 'SCP-06-05' AND EXISTS (
        SELECT 1 FROM system.compute.clusters where cardinality(tags) > 0 LIMIT 1
    ) THEN 'Yes'
    ELSE 'No'
  END AS implemented
FROM (
  SELECT * FROM VALUES
    ('SCP-01-06', 'Manage identity and access using least privilege', 'Use token management'),
    -- ('SCP-01-08', 'Manage identity and access using least privilege', 'Limit cluster creation rights'),
    ('SCP-01-11', 'Manage identity and access using least privilege', 'Customer-approved workspace login'),
    ('SCP-01-12', 'Manage identity and access using least privilege', 'Use clusters that support user isolation'),
    -- ('SCP-01-13', 'Manage identity and access using least privilege', 'Use service principals to run production jobs'),
    ('SCP-02-01', 'Protect data in transit and at rest', 'Avoid storing production data in DBFS'),
    ('SCP-02-03', 'Protect data in transit and at rest', 'Use data exfiltration settings within the admin console'),
    ('SCP-03-03', 'Secure your network and identify and protect endpoints', 'Implement network exfiltration protections'),
    ('SCP-06-01','Monitor system security','Monitor workspace using System tables'),
    ('SCP-06-02', 'Monitor system security', 'Use Databricks audit log'),
    ('SCP-06-03', 'Monitor system security', 'Monitor provisioning activities'),
    ('SCP-06-05', 'Monitor system security', 'Configure tagging to monitor usage and enable charge-back')
) waf(waf_id, principle, best_practice);

    ) THEN 'Yes'
    WHEN waf_id = 'SCP-06-03' AND EXISTS (
        SELECT 1 FROM system.query.history where lower(statement_text) LIKE '%system.compute.clusters%' AND lower(statement_text) LIKE '%create_time%'  LIMIT 1
    ) THEN 'Yes'
    WHEN waf_id = 'SCP-06-05' AND EXISTS (
        SELECT 1 FROM system.compute.clusters where cardinality(tags) > 0 LIMIT 1
    ) THEN 'Yes'
    ELSE 'No'

SELECT

      WHEN waf_id = 'OE-02-02' AND EXISTS (
      SELECT 1 from system.compute.clusters where policy_id is not null  limit 1
    ) THEN 'Yes'
      WHEN waf_id = 'OE-02-03' AND EXISTS (
      SELECT 1 FROM from system.lakeflow.jobs where delete_time is null limit 1
    ) THEN 'Yes'
    ELSE 'No'
  END AS implemented
FROM (
  SELECT * FROM VALUES
--  ('OE-01-01', 'Optimize build and release processes', 'Create a dedicated Lakehouse operations team')
-- , ('OE-01-02', 'Optimize build and release processes', 'Use enterprise source code management (SCM) ')
-- , ('OE-01-03', 'Optimize build and release processes', 'Standardize DevOps processes (CI/CD)')
-- , ('OE-01-04', 'Optimize build and release processes', 'Standardize MLOps processes across enterprise')
 ('OE-01-05', 'Optimize build and release processes', 'Define environment isolation strategy')
-- , ('OE-01-06', 'Optimize build and release processes', 'Streamline the usage and management of variouslarge language model (LLM) providers')
-- , ('OE-01-07', 'Optimize build and release processes', 'Define catalog strategy for your enterprise')
-- , ('OE-01-08', 'Optimize build and release processes', 'Compare LLM outputs on set prompts')
-- , ('OE-01-09', 'Optimize build and release processes', 'Build models with all representative, accurate and relevant data sources')
-- , ('OE-02-01', 'Automate deployments and workloads', 'Use Infrastructure as Code for deployments and maintenance')
, ('OE-02-02', 'Automate deployments and workloads', 'Standardize compute configurations')
, ('OE-02-03', 'Automate deployments and workloads', 'Use automated workflows for jobs')
-- , ('OE-02-04', 'Automate deployments and workloads', 'Use automated and event driven file ingestion ')
-- , ('OE-02-05', 'Automate deployments and workloads', 'Use ETL frameworks for data pipelines')
-- , ('OE-02-06', 'Automate deployments and workloads', 'Follow the deploy-code approach for ML workloads')
-- , ('OE-02-07', 'Automate deployments and workloads', 'Use a model registry to decouple code and model lifecycle')
-- , ('OE-02-08', 'Automate deployments and workloads', 'Automate ML experiment tracking')
-- , ('OE-02-09', 'Automate deployments and workloads', 'Reuse the same infrastructure to manage ML pipelines')
-- , ('OE-02-10', 'Automate deployments and workloads', 'Utilize declarative management for complex data and ML pipelines')
-- , ('OE-02-11', 'Automate deployments and workloads', 'Automate LLM evaluation')
, ('OE-03-01', 'Set up Monitoring, Alerting and Logging', 'Establish monitoring processes')
-- , ('OE-03-02', 'Set up Monitoring, Alerting and Logging', 'Use native and external tools for platform monitoring')
-- , ('OE-03-03', 'Set up Monitoring, Alerting and Logging', 'Establish an incident response strategy')
-- , ('OE-03-04', 'Set up Monitoring, Alerting and Logging', 'Triggering actions in response to a specific event')
-- , ('OE-04-01', 'Manage capacity and quotas', 'Manage service limits and quotas')
-- , ('OE-04-02', 'Manage capacity and quotas', 'Invest in capacity planning')
) waf(waf_id, principle, best_practice)
)
SELECT
  principle,
  COUNT(*) AS total_controls,
  SUM(CASE WHEN implemented = 'Yes' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS implemented_controls,
  ROUND(100 * SUM(CASE WHEN implemented = 'Yes' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / COUNT(*), 0) AS completion_percent
FROM waf_status
GROUP BY principle
ORDER BY principle;

datasets.name: 4745a0f9
queryLines:
WITH PE_01 AS (
SELECT 
    billing_origin_product
  , SUM(runs) AS runs_total
  , SUM(dbu_usage) AS dbu_usage_total
  , 'PE_01' AS waf_id
  , 'Detailed' AS dataset_type
  , SUM(CASE WHEN is_serverless = true THEN runs ELSE 0 END) AS sum_serverless_run
  , SUM(CASE WHEN is_serverless = true THEN dbu_usage ELSE 0 END) AS sum_serverless_dbu
  , SUM(CASE WHEN is_serverless = false THEN runs ELSE 0 END) AS sum_non_serverless_run
  , SUM(CASE WHEN is_serverless = false THEN dbu_usage ELSE 0 END) AS sum_non_serverless_dbu
  , SUM(CASE WHEN is_serverless = true THEN runs ELSE 0 END)/SUM(runs) AS pct_serverless_runs
  , SUM(CASE WHEN is_serverless = true THEN dbu_usage ELSE 0 END)/SUM(dbu_usage) AS pct_serverless_dbu
FROM 
(SELECT 
   COUNT(*) AS runs
  ,SUM(usage_quantity) AS dbu_usage, CASE WHEN billing_origin_product = 'ALL_PURPOSE' THEN 'INTERACTIVE' ELSE billing_origin_product END AS billing_origin_product
  , CASE WHEN sku_name LIKE '%SERVERLESS%' OR product_features.is_serverless = true THEN true ELSE false END AS is_serverless
 FROM system.billing.usage 
 WHERE usage_date BETWEEN current_date() - INTERVAL 90 DAY  AND current_date()
 AND array_contains(:workspace_id,workspace_id)
 AND usage_unit = 'DBU'
 AND billing_origin_product IN ('JOBS','MODEL_SERVING','LAKEFLOW_CONNECT','SQL','INTERACTIVE','DLT','ALL_PURPOSE')
 GROUP BY CASE WHEN billing_origin_product = 'ALL_PURPOSE' THEN 'INTERACTIVE' ELSE billing_origin_product END, CASE WHEN sku_name LIKE '%SERVERLESS%' OR product_features.is_serverless = true THEN true ELSE false END 
)CTE
GROUP BY
billing_origin_product 
),
PE_01_01_perc AS (
  SELECT 
    ROUND((SUM(sum_serverless_dbu)/SUM(dbu_usage_total))*100,2) AS actual_perc,
    'PE-01-01' AS waf_id,
    'Percentage' AS dataset_type
  FROM PE_01
  WHERE billing_origin_product <> 'MODEL_SERVING'
),
--waf_PE-02-*_cluster_metrics
usage AS (    
  SELECT usage_metadata.cluster_id AS cluster_id, account_id, workspace_id
  , count(*) as runs, SUM(usage_quantity) AS dbu_usage FROM system.billing.usage 
    WHERE 
     usage_date BETWEEN current_date() - INTERVAL 90 DAY AND current_date()
     AND array_contains(:workspace_id,workspace_id)
    AND usage_metadata.cluster_id IS NOT NULL
    GROUP BY account_id, workspace_id, usage_metadata.cluster_id
),
compute_met AS (
  SELECT * FROM 
    (select  row_number() over(partition by account_id, workspace_id, cluster_id order by change_time desc) AS rn
        , account_id, workspace_id, c.cluster_id, c.cluster_name, c.worker_node_type, worker_count, max_autoscale_workers, min_autoscale_workers
    from system.compute.clusters c 
    WHERE array_contains(:workspace_id,workspace_id)
    AND change_date <= current_date()) --TBD to check this filter
    WHERE rn = 1
),
PE_02 AS (
  SELECT 
       *
      , row_number() over( order by dbu_usage desc) AS rank
      , 'PE_02' AS waf_id
      , 'Detailed' AS dataset_type
    FROM(
      SELECT SUM(u.dbu_usage) AS dbu_usage, SUM(u.runs) AS runs, c.cluster_id, c.cluster_name, c.worker_node_type
            ,CASE WHEN ifnull(worker_count,ifnull(max_autoscale_workers,0)) > 1 THEN 'Multi-Node' ELSE 'Single-Node' END AS is_multi_worker
            , ifnull(worker_count,ifnull(max_autoscale_workers,0)) AS max_worker_count
            , CASE WHEN ifnull(c.min_autoscale_workers,0) = ifnull(c.max_autoscale_workers,0) THEN 0 ELSE 1 END AS is_autoscaling
      FROM
      usage u
      INNER JOIN
      compute_met c
      ON u.cluster_id = c.cluster_id
      AND u.account_id = c.account_id
      AND u.workspace_id = c.workspace_id
      GROUP BY
      c.cluster_id, c.cluster_name, c.worker_node_type
      ,CASE WHEN ifnull(worker_count,ifnull(max_autoscale_workers,0)) > 1 THEN 'Multi-Node' ELSE 'Single-Node' END
      , ifnull(worker_count,ifnull(max_autoscale_workers,0)) 
      , CASE WHEN ifnull(c.min_autoscale_workers,0) = ifnull(c.max_autoscale_workers,0) THEN 0 ELSE 1 END 
    )
),
PE_02_02_perc AS (
  SELECT 
    ROUND((SUM(CASE WHEN is_multi_worker = 'Multi-Node' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)/COUNT(*))*100,2) AS actual_perc,
    'PE-02-02' AS waf_id
    , 'Percentage' AS dataset_type
  FROM PE_02
),
PE_02_04_perc AS (
  SELECT 
    ROUND((SUM(CASE WHEN max_worker_count > 3 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)/COUNT(*))*100,2) AS actual_perc,
    'PE-02-04' AS waf_id
    , 'Percentage' AS dataset_type
  FROM PE_02
),
PE_02_05 AS (
  SELECT 
    'PE_02_05' AS waf_id,
    'Detailed' AS dataset_type,
    COUNT(*) as count_routines
  FROM system.information_schema.routines WHERE external_language = 'Python' 
),

PE_02_06 AS (
  SELECT 
    'PE_02_06' AS waf_id
  , 'Detailed' AS dataset_type
  , billing_origin_product
  , SUM(runs) AS runs_total
  , SUM(dbu_usage) AS dbu_usage_total
  , SUM(CASE WHEN is_photon = true THEN runs ELSE 0 END) AS sum_photon_run
  , SUM(CASE WHEN is_photon = true THEN dbu_usage ELSE 0 END) AS sum_photon_dbu
  , SUM(CASE WHEN is_photon = false THEN runs ELSE 0 END) AS sum_non_photon_run
  , SUM(CASE WHEN is_photon = false THEN dbu_usage ELSE 0 END) AS sum_non_photon_dbu
  , SUM(CASE WHEN is_photon = true THEN runs ELSE 0 END)/SUM(runs) AS pct_photon_runs
  , SUM(CASE WHEN is_photon = true THEN dbu_usage ELSE 0 END)/SUM(dbu_usage) AS pct_photon_dbu
  FROM (
    SELECT COUNT(*) AS runs,SUM(usage_quantity) AS dbu_usage, billing_origin_product
    , CASE WHEN sku_name LIKE '%PHOTON%' OR product_features.is_photon = true THEN true ELSE false END AS is_photon
    FROM system.billing.usage 
    WHERE usage_date BETWEEN current_date() - INTERVAL 90 DAY AND current_date()
    AND array_contains(:workspace_id,workspace_id)
    AND billing_origin_product  IN ('JOBS','LAKEFLOW_CONNECT','VECTOR_SEARCH','DATABASE','DLT','ALL_PURPOSE','ONLINE_TABLES','INTERACTIVE')
    AND usage_unit = 'DBU'
    GROUP BY billing_origin_product, CASE WHEN sku_name LIKE '%PHOTON%' OR product_features.is_photon = true THEN true ELSE false END 
)
GROUP BY
billing_origin_product 
),
PE_02_06_perc AS 
(
  SELECT 
    ROUND((SUM(sum_photon_dbu)/SUM(dbu_usage_total))*100,2) AS actual_perc,
    'PE-02-06' AS waf_id,
    'Percentage' AS dataset_type
  FROM PE_02_06
),
PE_02_07_perc AS 
(
  SELECT 
    ROUND((COUNT(DISTINCT split(worker_node_type,'[.]')[0])/COUNT(1))*100,2) AS actual_perc,
    'PE-02-07' AS waf_id,
    'Percentage' AS dataset_type
  FROM PE_02
),


waf_status AS(
SELECT
  waf.waf_id,
  principle,
  best_practice,
  COALESCE(p11p.actual_perc,p22p.actual_perc,p24p.actual_perc,p26p.actual_perc,p27p.actual_perc,0.00) AS actual_perc,
  CASE 
    WHEN waf.waf_id = 'PE-01-02' AND EXISTS (
      SELECT 1 FROM PE_01 WHERE billing_origin_product = 'MODEL_SERVING' LIMIT 1
    ) THEN 'Yes' --TBD dbu usage limit?
    WHEN waf.waf_id = 'PE-02-05' AND NOT EXISTS (
      SELECT 1 FROM PE_02_05 LIMIT 1 
    ) THEN 'Yes'
    WHEN waf.waf_id NOT IN ('PE-01-02','PE-02-05') 
          AND  required_percentage <= COALESCE(p11p.actual_perc,p22p.actual_perc,p24p.actual_perc,p26p.actual_perc,p27p.actual_perc,0) THEN 'Yes'
    ELSE 'No'
  END AS implemented,
  required_percentage
FROM (
  SELECT * FROM VALUES
    ('PE-01-01', 'Utilize serverless capabilities', 'Use serverless architecture',30),
    ('PE-01-02', 'Utilize serverless capabilities', 'Use an enterprise grade model serving service',0),
    --('PE-02-01', 'Utilize serverless capabilities', 'Understand your data ingestion and access patterns'),
    ('PE-02-02', 'Design workloads for performance', 'Use parallel computation where it is beneficial',30),
    --('PE-02-03', 'Design workloads for performance', 'Analyze the whole chain of execution'),
    ('PE-02-04', 'Design workloads for performance', 'Prefer larger clusters',30),
    ('PE-02-05', 'Design workloads for performance', 'Use native Spark operations',0),
    ('PE-02-06', 'Design workloads for performance', 'Use native platform engines',30),
    ('PE-02-07', 'Design workloads for performance', 'Understand your hardware and workload type',20)
    --('PE-02-08', 'Design workloads for performance', 'Use caching'),
    --('PE-02-09', 'Design workloads for performance', 'Use compaction'),
) waf(waf_id, principle, best_practice,required_percentage)
LEFT JOIN 
PE_01_01_perc p11p
ON waf.waf_id = p11p.waf_id
LEFT JOIN 
PE_02_02_perc p22p
ON waf.waf_id = p22p.waf_id
LEFT JOIN
PE_02_04_perc p24p
ON waf.waf_id = p24p.waf_id
LEFT JOIN
PE_02_06_perc p26p
ON waf.waf_id = p26p.waf_id
LEFT JOIN
PE_02_07_perc p27p
ON waf.waf_id = p27p.waf_id
)
SELECT
  waf_id,
  principle,
  best_practice,
  implemented,
  actual_perc,
  required_percentage,
  COUNT(*) OVER (PARTITION BY principle) AS total_controls,
  ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY principle ORDER BY waf_id) AS row_num,
  SUM(CASE WHEN implemented = 'Yes' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) OVER (PARTITION BY principle) AS implemented_controls,
  ROUND(100 * SUM(CASE WHEN implemented = 'Yes' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) OVER (PARTITION BY principle)/ COUNT(*) OVER (PARTITION BY principle) , 0) AS completion_percent,
  ROUND(100 * SUM(CASE WHEN implemented = 'Yes' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) OVER () / COUNT(*) OVER (), 0) AS total_percentage,
  'Summary' AS dataset_type
FROM waf_status
ORDER BY waf_id

datasets.name: 7fbe58c5
queryLines:
WITH PE_01 AS (
SELECT 
    billing_origin_product
  , SUM(runs) AS runs_total
  , SUM(dbu_usage) AS dbu_usage_total
  , CASE WHEN is_serverless = true THEN 'SERVERLESS' ELSE 'CLASSIC' END AS classic_or_serverless
  , CASE WHEN is_photon = true THEN 'PHOTON' ELSE 'NON-PHOTON' END AS photon_or_non_photon
  , CASE WHEN performance_target = 'COST_OPTIMIZED' THEN 'STANDARD' ELSE performance_target END AS performance_target
  , CASE WHEN product_tier is null and classic_or_serverless = 'SERVERLESS' THEN 'SERVERLESS' ELSE product_tier END AS product_tier
  , unique_id
  , compute_id
  , instance_pool_id
  , CASE WHEN instance_pool_id is null THEN 'NO' ELSE 'YES' END AS instance_pool_present
  , 'PE_01' AS waf_id
  , 'Detailed' AS dataset_type
  --, SUM(CASE WHEN is_serverless = true THEN runs ELSE 0 END) AS sum_serverless_run
  --, SUM(CASE WHEN is_serverless = true THEN dbu_usage ELSE 0 END) AS sum_serverless_dbu
  --, SUM(CASE WHEN is_serverless = false THEN runs ELSE 0 END) AS sum_non_serverless_run
  --, SUM(CASE WHEN is_serverless = false THEN dbu_usage ELSE 0 END) AS sum_non_serverless_dbu
  --, SUM(CASE WHEN is_serverless = true THEN runs ELSE 0 END)/SUM(runs) AS pct_serverless_runs
  --, SUM(CASE WHEN is_serverless = true THEN dbu_usage ELSE 0 END)/SUM(dbu_usage) AS pct_serverless_dbu
FROM 
(SELECT 
   COUNT(*) AS runs
  ,SUM(usage_quantity) AS dbu_usage, 
   CASE WHEN billing_origin_product = 'ALL_PURPOSE' THEN 'INTERACTIVE' 
        WHEN billing_origin_product = 'DATABASE' THEN 'LAKEBASE' 
        WHEN billing_origin_product = 'DLT' THEN 'SDP'
        ELSE billing_origin_product END AS billing_origin_product
  ,CASE WHEN sku_name LIKE '%SERVERLESS%' OR product_features.is_serverless = true THEN true ELSE false END AS is_serverless
  ,CASE WHEN sku_name LIKE '%PHOTON%' OR product_features.is_photon = true THEN true ELSE false END AS is_photon
  ,CASE WHEN product_features.performance_target IS NULL THEN 'UNDEFINED' ELSE product_features.performance_target END AS performance_target
  ,coalesce(product_features.jobs_tier,product_features.sql_tier,product_features.dlt_tier) AS product_tier
  ,coalesce(usage_metadata.job_id,usage_metadata.dlt_pipeline_id) AS unique_id
  ,coalesce(usage_metadata.cluster_id,usage_metadata.warehouse_id) AS compute_id
  ,usage_metadata.instance_pool_id AS instance_pool_id
 FROM system.billing.usage 
 WHERE usage_date BETWEEN current_date() - INTERVAL 90 DAY  AND current_date()
 AND array_contains(:workspace_id,workspace_id)
 AND usage_unit = 'DBU'
 AND billing_origin_product IN ('LAKEFLOW_CONNECT','DATA_QUALITY_MONITORING','PREDICTIVE_OPTIMIZATION','DATABASE','APPS','VECTOR_SEARCH','JOBS','MODEL_SERVING','LAKEFLOW_CONNECT','SQL','INTERACTIVE','DLT','ALL_PURPOSE')
 GROUP BY CASE WHEN billing_origin_product = 'ALL_PURPOSE' THEN 'INTERACTIVE' 
               WHEN billing_origin_product = 'DATABASE' THEN 'LAKEBASE'  
              WHEN billing_origin_product = 'DLT' THEN 'SDP'
          ELSE billing_origin_product END
          , CASE WHEN sku_name LIKE '%SERVERLESS%' OR product_features.is_serverless = true THEN true ELSE false END
          ,CASE WHEN sku_name LIKE '%PHOTON%' OR product_features.is_photon = true THEN true ELSE false END
          ,CASE WHEN product_features.performance_target IS NULL THEN 'UNDEFINED' ELSE product_features.performance_target END
          ,coalesce(product_features.jobs_tier,product_features.sql_tier,product_features.dlt_tier)
          ,coalesce(usage_metadata.job_id,usage_metadata.dlt_pipeline_id)
          ,coalesce(usage_metadata.cluster_id,usage_metadata.warehouse_id)
          ,usage_metadata.instance_pool_id 
)CTE
GROUP BY
billing_origin_product,is_serverless,is_photon,performance_target,product_tier,unique_id,compute_id,instance_pool_id
)
SELECT
  waf_id,
  dataset_type,
  billing_origin_product,
  runs_total,
  dbu_usage_total, 
  classic_or_serverless,
  photon_or_non_photon,
  performance_target,
  product_tier,
  unique_id,
  compute_id,
  instance_pool_id,
  instance_pool_present
  --sum_serverless_run,
  --sum_serverless_dbu,
  --sum_non_serverless_run,
  --sum_non_serverless_dbu,
  --pct_serverless_runs,
  --pct_serverless_dbu
FROM PE_01

datasets.name: 1cc9767e
queryLines:
SELECT 
    AVG(input_token_count) AS avg_input_token
  , AVG(output_token_count) AS avg_output_token
  , COUNT(1) AS number_requests
  , eu.workspace_id
  , se.entity_type
  , se.entity_name
  , se.custom_model_config.min_concurrency AS custom_model_min_concurrency
  , se.custom_model_config.max_concurrency AS custom_model_max_concurrency
  , se.custom_model_config.compute_type AS custom_model_compute_type
  , CASE WHEN se.entity_type = 'CUSTOM_MODEL' THEN se.endpoint_name ELSE '' END AS endpoint_name 
  , SUM(bu.dbu) AS dbu
 FROM system.serving.endpoint_usage eu
INNER JOIN system.serving.served_entities se
ON eu.served_entity_id = se.served_entity_id
LEFT JOIN 
(SELECT 
    SUM(usage_quantity) AS dbu
  ,  workspace_id
  , usage_metadata.endpoint_id As endpoint_id
FROM system.billing.usage
WHERE billing_origin_product = 'MODEL_SERVING'
AND usage_date BETWEEN current_date() - INTERVAL 90 DAY  AND current_date()
AND array_contains(:workspace_id,workspace_id)
AND usage_metadata.endpoint_id IS NOT NULL 
AND usage_unit = 'DBU'
GROUP BY
    workspace_id
  , usage_metadata.endpoint_id
)bu
ON    eu.workspace_id = bu.workspace_id 
  AND se.endpoint_id = bu.endpoint_id
WHERE request_time BETWEEN current_date() - INTERVAL 90 DAY  AND current_date()
AND array_contains(:workspace_id,eu.workspace_id)
AND eu.status_code = 200
AND entity_type IN ('FOUNDATION_MODEL','CUSTOM_MODEL')
GROUP BY 
    eu.workspace_id
  , se.entity_type
  , se.entity_name
  , se.custom_model_config.min_concurrency
  , se.custom_model_config.max_concurrency
  , se.custom_model_config.compute_type
  , CASE WHEN se.entity_type = 'CUSTOM_MODEL' THEN se.endpoint_name ELSE '' END

ORDER BY dbu DESC

datasets.name: a54e94d2
queryLines:
--waf_PE-02-*_cluster_metrics
WITH usage AS (    
  SELECT usage_metadata.cluster_id AS cluster_id, account_id, workspace_id
  , count(*) as runs, SUM(usage_quantity) AS dbu_usage FROM system.billing.usage 
    WHERE 
     usage_date BETWEEN current_date() - INTERVAL 90 DAY  AND current_date()
     AND array_contains(:workspace_id,workspace_id)
    AND usage_metadata.cluster_id IS NOT NULL
    GROUP BY account_id, workspace_id, usage_metadata.cluster_id
),
compute_met AS (
  SELECT * FROM 
    (select  row_number() over(partition by account_id, workspace_id, cluster_id order by change_time desc) AS rn
        , account_id, workspace_id, c.cluster_id, c.cluster_name, c.worker_node_type, worker_count, max_autoscale_workers, min_autoscale_workers
    from system.compute.clusters c 
    WHERE array_contains(:workspace_id,workspace_id)
    AND change_date <= current_date()) --TBD to check this filter
    WHERE rn = 1
),
node_timeline AS (
  SELECT
    workspace_id,
    cluster_id,
    AVG(cpu_user_percent + cpu_system_percent) AS Avg_CPU_Utilization,
    MAX(cpu_user_percent + cpu_system_percent) AS Peak_CPU_Utilization,
    AVG(cpu_wait_percent) AS Avg_CPU_Wait,
    MAX(cpu_wait_percent) AS Max_CPU_Wait,
    AVG(mem_used_percent) AS Avg_Memory_Utilization,
    MAX(mem_used_percent) AS Max_Memory_Utilization,
    AVG(network_received_bytes) / (1024 ^ 2) AS Avg_Network_MB_Received_per_Minute,
    AVG(network_sent_bytes) / (1024 ^ 2) AS Avg_Network_MB_Sent_per_Minute,
    COUNT(1) OVER (PARTITION BY workspace_id, cluster_id) AS count_nodes
  FROM system.compute.node_timeline
  WHERE
    start_time >= current_date() - INTERVAL 90 DAY
  GROUP BY 
    workspace_id,
    cluster_id,
    driver
  QUALIFY count_nodes = 1 OR driver = false
), --TBD single node
PE_02 AS (
  SELECT 
       *
      , row_number() over( order by dbu_usage desc) AS rank
      , 'PE_02' AS waf_id
      , 'Detailed' AS dataset_type
    FROM(
      SELECT SUM(u.dbu_usage) AS dbu_usage, SUM(u.runs) AS runs,
             AVG(n.Avg_CPU_Utilization) AS avg_cpu_utilization,
             AVG(n.Peak_CPU_Utilization) AS peak_cpu_utilization,
             AVG(n.Avg_Memory_Utilization) AS avg_memory_utilization,
             AVG(n.Max_Memory_Utilization) AS max_memory_utilization,
             c.cluster_id, 
             c.cluster_name, 
             c.worker_node_type
            ,CASE WHEN ifnull(worker_count,ifnull(max_autoscale_workers,0)) > 1 THEN 'Multi-Node' ELSE 'Single-Node' END AS is_multi_worker
            , ifnull(worker_count,ifnull(max_autoscale_workers,0)) AS max_worker_count
            , CASE WHEN ifnull(c.min_autoscale_workers,0) = ifnull(c.max_autoscale_workers,0) THEN 0 ELSE 1 END AS is_autoscaling
      FROM
      usage u
      INNER JOIN
      compute_met c
      ON u.cluster_id = c.cluster_id
      AND u.account_id = c.account_id
      AND u.workspace_id = c.workspace_id
      LEFT JOIN
      node_timeline n
      ON c.cluster_id = n.cluster_id
      AND c.workspace_id = n.workspace_id
      GROUP BY
      c.cluster_id, c.cluster_name, c.worker_node_type
      ,CASE WHEN ifnull(worker_count,ifnull(max_autoscale_workers,0)) > 1 THEN 'Multi-Node' ELSE 'Single-Node' END
      , ifnull(worker_count,ifnull(max_autoscale_workers,0)) 
      , CASE WHEN ifnull(c.min_autoscale_workers,0) = ifnull(c.max_autoscale_workers,0) THEN 0 ELSE 1 END 
    )
)

 
SELECT
  waf_id,
  dataset_type,
  runs AS runs_total,
  dbu_usage AS dbu_usage_total, 
  avg_cpu_Utilization,
  peak_cpu_utilization,
  avg_memory_utilization,
  max_memory_utilization,
  cluster_id,
  cluster_name,
  worker_node_type,
  is_multi_worker,
  max_worker_count,
  is_autoscaling,
  CASE WHEN rank <= 10 THEN 'Top 10' ELSE 'Others' END AS rank
FROM PE_02
ORDER BY dbu_usage_total DESC

WITH PE_02_05 AS (
  SELECT 
    'PE_02_05' AS waf_id,
    'Detailed' AS dataset_type,
    COUNT(*) as count_routines
  FROM system.information_schema.routines WHERE external_language = 'Python' 
)
SELECT
  waf_id,
  dataset_type,

FROM PE_02_05

datasets.name: 623dda51
queryLines:
WITH PE_02_06 AS (
  SELECT 
    'PE_02_06' AS waf_id
  , 'Detailed' AS dataset_type
  , billing_origin_product
  , SUM(runs) AS runs_total
  , SUM(dbu_usage) AS dbu_usage_total
  , SUM(CASE WHEN is_photon = true THEN runs ELSE 0 END) AS sum_photon_run
  , SUM(CASE WHEN is_photon = true THEN dbu_usage ELSE 0 END) AS sum_photon_dbu
  , SUM(CASE WHEN is_photon = false THEN runs ELSE 0 END) AS sum_non_photon_run
  , SUM(CASE WHEN is_photon = false THEN dbu_usage ELSE 0 END) AS sum_non_photon_dbu
  , SUM(CASE WHEN is_photon = true THEN runs ELSE 0 END)/SUM(runs) AS pct_photon_runs
  , SUM(CASE WHEN is_photon = true THEN dbu_usage ELSE 0 END)/SUM(dbu_usage) AS pct_photon_dbu
  FROM (
    SELECT COUNT(*) AS runs,SUM(usage_quantity) AS dbu_usage, billing_origin_product
    , CASE WHEN sku_name LIKE '%PHOTON%' OR product_features.is_photon = true THEN true ELSE false END AS is_photon
    FROM system.billing.usage 
    WHERE usage_date BETWEEN current_date() - INTERVAL 90 DAY  AND current_date()
    AND array_contains(:workspace_id,workspace_id)
    AND billing_origin_product  IN ('JOBS','LAKEFLOW_CONNECT','VECTOR_SEARCH','DATABASE','DLT','ALL_PURPOSE','ONLINE_TABLES','INTERACTIVE')
    AND usage_unit = 'DBU'
    GROUP BY billing_origin_product, CASE WHEN sku_name LIKE '%PHOTON%' OR product_features.is_photon = true THEN true ELSE false END 
)
GROUP BY
billing_origin_product 
)
SELECT
  waf_id,
  dataset_type,
  billing_origin_product,
  runs_total,
  dbu_usage_total, 
  sum_photon_run,
  sum_photon_dbu,
  sum_non_photon_run,
  sum_non_photon_dbu,
  pct_photon_runs,
  pct_photon_dbu
FROM PE_02_06

datasets.name: 60cfe928
queryLines:
WITH R_01_01 AS (
SELECT 
    --table_catalog AS cat_name,
    --table_schema AS sch_name,
    data_source_format AS tables_format,
    count(data_source_format) AS no_of_tables,
    'R_01_01' AS waf_id,
    'Detailed' AS dataset_type
    --table_type
    FROM system.information_schema.tables group by all
),
R_01_01_perc AS (
SELECT 
  ROUND((cnt_acid_tables/all_tables)*100,2) AS actual_perc,
  'R-01-01' AS waf_id,
  'Percentage' AS dataset_type
  FROM(
    SELECT
      SUM(CASE WHEN data_source_format IN ('DELTA','ICEBERG') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS cnt_acid_tables,
      count(*) AS all_tables
    FROM system.information_schema.tables 
  )
),
R_01_04 AS ( 
    SELECT
    workspace_id,
    cluster_id,
    cluster_name,
    owned_by,
    auto_termination_minutes,
    'R_01_04' AS waf_id,
    'Detailed' AS dataset_type,
    ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY workspace_id, cluster_id ORDER BY change_time DESC) as rn
  FROM system.compute.clusters
  WHERE (cluster_source="UI" OR cluster_source="API") AND array_contains(:workspace_id,workspace_id)
  QUALIFY rn=1 AND delete_time is null
),
R_01_04_perc AS ( 
    SELECT
    ROUND((cnt_termination_minutes/all_clusters)*100,2) AS actual_perc,
    'R-01-04' AS waf_id,
    'Percentage' AS dataset_type
    FROM 
    (SELECT
        SUM(CASE WHEN auto_termination_minutes IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS cnt_termination_minutes,
        COUNT(*) AS all_clusters
    FROM R_01_04)
),
R_01_05 AS (
  select workspace_id
  , usage_metadata.endpoint_name endpoint_name
  , billing_origin_product
  , sum(usage_quantity) usage_dbus 
  , 'R_01_05' AS waf_id
  , 'Detailed' AS dataset_type
  from system.billing.usage
  WHERE sku_name LIKE '%SERVERLESS_REAL_TIME_INFERENCE%'
  AND usage_date BETWEEN :date_filter.min AND :date_filter.max
  AND array_contains(:workspace_id,workspace_id)
  AND usage_metadata.endpoint_name is not null
  group by endpoint_name, billing_origin_product,workspace_id
),
--TBD - a DBU threshold?


R_03_01 AS (
  select workspace_id, cluster_id, cluster_name, owned_by, worker_count, create_time  
  , 'R_03_01' AS waf_id
  , 'Detailed' AS dataset_type
  , max_autoscale_workers
    from system.compute.clusters 
  where cluster_source = 'JOB'
  and create_time BETWEEN :date_filter.min AND :date_filter.max
  and array_contains(:workspace_id,workspace_id)
),

R_03_01_perc AS (
 SELECT
    ROUND((cnt_autoscale_minutes/all_clusters)*100,2) AS actual_perc,
    'R-03-01' AS waf_id,
    'Percentage' AS dataset_type
    FROM 
    (SELECT
        SUM(CASE WHEN max_autoscale_workers IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS cnt_autoscale_minutes,
        COUNT(*) AS all_clusters
    FROM R_03_01) 

),
R_03_02 AS (
  SELECT
    workspace_id,
    warehouse_id,
    warehouse_name,
    warehouse_type,
    warehouse_size,
    min_clusters,
    max_clusters,
    auto_stop_minutes,
    'R_03_02' AS waf_id,
    'Detailed' AS dataset_type
FROM
    system.compute.warehouses
    WHERE array_contains(:workspace_id,workspace_id)
QUALIFY
    ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY warehouse_id ORDER BY change_time DESC) = 1
    and delete_time is null
),
R_03_02_perc AS (
  SELECT
    ROUND((cnt_autoscale_minutes/all_clusters)*100,2) AS actual_perc,
    'R-03-02' AS waf_id,
    'Percentage' AS dataset_type
    FROM 
    (SELECT
        SUM(CASE WHEN IFNULL(min_clusters,0) <> IFNULL(max_clusters,0) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS cnt_autoscale_minutes,
        COUNT(*) AS all_clusters
    FROM R_03_02) 

),
waf_status AS (
SELECT
  waf.waf_id,
  principle,
  best_practice,
  COALESCE(r11p.actual_perc,r14p.actual_perc,r31p.actual_perc,r32p.actual_perc,0) AS actual_perc,
  required_percentage,
  CASE 
    WHEN waf.waf_id = 'R-01-05' AND EXISTS (
      SELECT 1 FROM R_01_05 LIMIT 1
    ) THEN 'Yes'
--    WHEN waf_id = 'R-01-06' AND EXISTS (
--      SELECT 1 FROM system.billing.usage WHERE sku_name LIKE '%SERVERLESS%' OR sku_name LIKE '%DLT%' LIMIT 1
--    ) THEN 'Yes'
    WHEN waf.waf_id <> 'R-01-05' AND required_percentage <= COALESCE(r11p.actual_perc,r14p.actual_perc,r31p.actual_perc,r32p.actual_perc,0) THEN 'Yes'
    ELSE 'No'
  END AS implemented
FROM (
  SELECT * FROM VALUES
    ('R-01-01', 'Design for failure', 'Use a data format that supports ACID transactions',30),
    --('R-01-02', 'Design for failure', 'Use a resilient distributed data engine for all workloads'),
    --('R-01-03', 'Design for failure', 'Automatically rescue invalid or nonconforming data '),
    ('R-01-04', 'Design for failure', 'Configure jobs for automatic retries and termination',80),
    ('R-01-05', 'Design for failure', 'Use a scalable and production-grade model serving infrastructure',0),
    --('R-01-06', 'Design for failure', 'Use managed services for your workloads'),
    --('R-02-03', 'Manage data quality', 'Actively manage schemas'),
    --('R-02-04', 'Manage data quality', 'Use constraints and data expectations'),
    ('R-03-01', 'Design for autoscaling', 'Enable autoscaling for ETL workloads',30),
    ('R-03-02', 'Design for autoscaling', 'Use autoscaling for SQL Warehouses',30)
    --('R-02-09', 'Design workloads for performance', 'Use compaction'),
) waf(waf_id, principle, best_practice,required_percentage)
LEFT JOIN 
r_01_01_perc r11p
ON waf.waf_id = r11p.waf_id
LEFT JOIN 
r_03_02_perc r32p
ON waf.waf_id = r32p.waf_id
LEFT JOIN
r_01_04_perc r14p
ON waf.waf_id = r14p.waf_id
LEFT JOIN
r_03_01_perc r31p
ON waf.waf_id = r31p.waf_id
)
SELECT
  waf_id,
  principle,
  best_practice,
  implemented,
  actual_perc,
  required_percentage,
  COUNT(*) OVER (PARTITION BY principle) AS total_controls,
  ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY principle ORDER BY waf_id) AS row_num,
  SUM(CASE WHEN implemented = 'Yes' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) OVER (PARTITION BY principle) AS implemented_controls,
  ROUND(100 * SUM(CASE WHEN implemented = 'Yes' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) OVER (PARTITION BY principle)/ COUNT(*) OVER (PARTITION BY principle) , 0) AS completion_percent,
  ROUND(100 * SUM(CASE WHEN implemented = 'Yes' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) OVER () / COUNT(*) OVER (), 0) AS total_percentage,
  'Summary' AS dataset_type
FROM waf_status

#### CO-01-01

#### CO-01-04
 

**Use up-to-date [Runtimes](https://docs.databricks.com/aws/en/release-notes/runtime/) for your workloads**
